refnamediv.refpurpose: Extracts uploaded file embedded in the FDF

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Extracts a file uploaded by means of the "file selection" field fieldname and stores it under savepath. savepath may be the name of a plain file or an existing directory in which the file is to be created under its original name. Any existing file under the same name will be overwritten.

note.para: There seems to be no other way to find out the original filename but to store the file using a directory as savepath and check for the basename it was stored under.

refsect1.para:
The returned array contains the following fields:
path - path were the file got stored size - size of the stored file in bytes type - mimetype if given in the FDF

example.title: Storing an uploaded file
example.programlisting:
<?php 
  $fdf = fdf_open_string($HTTP_FDF_DATA);
  $data = fdf_get_attachment($fdf, "filename", "/tmpdir");
  echo "The uploaded file is stored in $data[path]";
?>
